text: Francesca Dallapé (born 24 June 1986 in Trento) is an Italian diver. With Tania Cagnotto, she won silver in the 3 m synchronized springboard at the 2016 Summer Olympics. ==Career== Dallapé finished sixth with Noemi Batki in the synchronized 3 metre springboard event of the 2008 Olympic Games. At the 2012 Summer Olympics, Dallapé competed in both the individual 3 metre springboard, finishing in 15th, and the synchronised 3 metre springboard, finishing in 4th place with Tania Cagnotto. At the 2016 Summer Olympics, won silver in synchronized 3 metre springboard with Cagnotto. ==Olympic results== {| class="wikitable" width=50% style="font-size:90%; text-align:center;" |- ! Year !!
